featureSchema.name: Collaboration
featureSchema.description: Allows users to share task lists and gives team members the ability to comment on tasks, fostering collaboration.
featureSchema.userStory: As a user, I want to share my task lists and collaborate with team members through comments and updates.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria: Users must be able to invite others to view or modify task lists. The system should support adding and viewing comments on individual tasks.
featureSchema.additional: Include role-based permissions to manage what collaborators are allowed to do within the shared lists.
featureSchema.prompt: Develop a collaboration feature that supports task list sharing and commenting. This should include user invitation, role management, and real-time updates for comments.
featureSchema.notes: Ensure data privacy and secure access controls for shared content.
